subdisciplines.name: Classical Archaeology
subdisciplines.description: The study of ancient Greece and Rome through their material culture

subdisciplines.name: Egyptology
subdisciplines.description: The study of ancient Egypt through its archaeology, history, and culture

subdisciplines.name: Maritime Archaeology
subdisciplines.description: The study of human interactions with the sea through the excavation and analysis of shipwrecks, harbors, and other underwater sites
